Text:
Thnx 4 the films and pdf, DrHofmann. Great stuff man, i have lots of vids and pdf of martial arts to share, but i cant seem to get the hang of uploading the stuff.
Some help anyone?

...Using BitComet

Krav Maga..Israeli Army Commando Self Defense. The stuff really works. The best in street defense as well. Absolutely well worth the download. I shall keep the seed going for as long as I possibly can so everyone grab it. It is worth the large DL. While everyone who takes martial arts believes there style or form is the best, this is not really a martial art. This is down and dirty self defense. And this is, IMNSHO, far the best for basic street survival as well as Army and Marine training.
Enjoy y'all!

this is an awesome fighting style, i've seen it demonstrated and studied a few times and all i can say is that is has no mercy, it is a style based on you winning and the other losing. if you're looking for some pretty moves with spinning and grace try something like judo. but as far as kicking ass and taking names goes, there's no substitute for this stuff. just gotta watch it a couple times and i'll need a new punching bag.

TILL DrHofmann!!!!!
Du har laddat ner en skiva som heter Sons of satan - In Times Of Fire. Kan du vara trevlig och seeda den igen?

WOW, this is the real deal people.

I train krav maga my self ( low level ) and
was interested in watching some advanced krav maga. This is the first 100% correct vid i have found. 

Download or regret....  GREATE TORRENT DrHofmann. Taking my hat of to you.

PS. Go to www.kravmaga.com if u don't know wat krav maga is or is about, here u can buy equipment and other krav maga stuff, learn about krav maga and watch vids. 

PSS u kan alow buy this dvd Colection and books. HINT HINT.....
Great stuff DrHofmann ... a week after watching these videos people not only stopped giving me wedgies but also quit touching the pens in my shirt pocket protector.
PLEASE SEED!!!! I KNOW I WILL!!! THANK YOU!!!
Thank you very much =D! DrHofman, is the guy who stumbled upon LSD-25, (fun fact). So thanks to both of you i guess.

I thought Krav Maga was a kind of martial art, but it turns out that you can't practice it without impairing your opponents reproducion capacity. Almost all moves target the crotch. For women it's very valid, since men are phisically stronger they need to explore vulnerabilities. But for a guy? We now how much this hurts. Anyway, thanks for the video, very informative.

Glad to help everyone!! :-)
